model.xml

Class XmlAttributeSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.xml.XmlAttributeSelection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner, java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable

    public class XmlAttributeSelection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable, java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner
    A Transferable which implements the capability required to transfer Attributes. This Transferable properly supports xmlAttrFlavor
    Author:
    mircopalese

        public boolean isDataFlavorSupported(java.awt.datatransfer.DataFlavor flavor)

        Specified by:
        isDataFlavorSupported in interface java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable
        Parameters:
        flavor - the requested flavor for the data
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if flavor is null

                                        java.io.IOException
        Returns the Transferable's data in the requested DataFlavor if possible. If the desired flavor is
        Specified by:
        getTransferData in interface java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable

        Returns:
        the data in the requested flavor,
        Throws:
        java.awt.datatransfer.UnsupportedFlavorException - if the requested data flavor is not equivalent to data flavor specified in flavors array
